Gativﾄ］

Enhancing Motion Performance

Gativﾄ］ is a most unique mobile app designed for measuring and keeping a track of Motorcycle's Chain Slackness and Peak Acceleration.

Log In

Chain Slackness

Chain slackness represents the tightness and looseness of the chain measured in mm. Appropriate chain slackness ensures efficient power transmission .Have a Loose chain issue? Get it serviced now!

Peak Acceleration

Acceleration is the change in speed measured in m/s2. Knowing this will help you to maintain a good run-in. Achieving max acceleration can reach you to high speed. How fast is your acceleration? Check it now!
